text:
Hi Team,

I'm facing an issue, I am using HubSpot forms for one of my client
and we are using it in popup like same form on 3-4 popups, so the below script is loading 3-4 times on each page affecting the page speed

<https://js-eu1.hsforms.net/forms/embed/v2.js>
Is there any way we can reduce the JS loading to only once
